name: Borris
description:
Borris

This is Borris, a metroidvania with moderate difficulty. Hope you have fun :)

Btw, Borris was made as a personal exercise. So don't expect 120 hours of longevity.

What will happen next

I'll probably add ( in the next few days/weeks (depending on my mood) ):

  • music and sound
  • speed run mod

and i will do some bug correction

Control

Move W,A,S,D or Up,Left,Down,Right Arrow

Jump Space Bar Interact W or Up arrow Basic Sword Fast Travel Magic Burst Sword Dash Credit Game - Me-Theo Sprites below were originally created by - Creature-mixer by Kenney
  • Borris (Player)
  • Shopkeeper
  • Ennemies
Big thanks to

  • KarmaHks for finding the name of the game
  • My cats, because devloping with a cat on your lap is so cool :)
And to my boredom in class without which none of this would be possible
